definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以詩歌讚美神的名，以感謝稱他爲大。

sentences.english: 3Yet you are enthroned as the Holy One; you are the praise of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 但你是聖潔的，是用以色列的讚美爲寶座的。

sentences.english: Gani ceramics, let the ceramic glorifies life!
sentences.chinese: 簡一陶瓷，讓瓷磚讚美生活。

sentences.english: It's a fine line between expressing admiration and being obsequious.
sentences.chinese: 在讚美和奉承之間有微妙的區別。

sentences.english: I laud the people of Lijang.
sentences.chinese: 我可是讚美麗江的人民。

sentences.english: Jesus, Praise of my old age!
The young movie star revelled in the public's admiration.
sentences.chinese: 這位年輕的電影明星沉湎於觀衆的讚美聲中。
圍觀者的讚美是施虐狂。

sentences.english: Ms Blears pointedly refused to say a good word about the prime minister as she resigned.
sentences.chinese: 她在離任時曾很決絕的拒絕對首相發表一句讚美之詞。

sentences.english: And paid for learning with your empty praise.
sentences.chinese: 你們對學問的報酬只是空口讚美。

sentences.english: Then use the list to spend time prayerfully praising God.
sentences.chinese: 然後，用這些筆記來幫助你在禱告中讚美上帝。

sentences.english: The broken strings of Vina sing no more your praise.
sentences.chinese: 七絃琴的斷線不再彈唱讚美你的詩歌。

sentences.english: Even from the outer walls there was much artwork to admire.
sentences.chinese: 甚至從外牆開始就有很多藝術品值得讚美。

sentences.english: And what is 't but mine own when I praise thee?
sentences.chinese: 如果讚美你等於讚美自己，又有何益？

sentences.english: And what is 't but mine own when I praise thee?
sentences.chinese: 如果讚美你等於讚美自己，又有何益？

definition: favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
